content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-21.0, -73.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -21.0, -73.0) mining copper ore
- Iron chest for ore storage (position -21.5, -74.5)
- Burner inserter (position -20.5, -74.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace (position -19.0, -74.0) for smelting copper plates

### Iron Mining and Processing Complex (-2.0, -76.0 to 7.5, -72.5)
Multi-stage processing line consisting of:
- Burner mining drill (position -2.0, -76.0) mining iron ore
- Primary storage chest (position -1.5, -74.5)
- Transport belt network connecting components
- Multiple processing stages with:
  - First furnace stage (position 3.0, -73.0) with inserters at (3.5, -74.5)
  - Second furnace stage (position 5.0, -73.0) with inserters at (5.5, -74.5)
  - Multiple iron chests for intermediate storage (positions 1.5, -74.5; 3.5, -75.5)
  - Final output chest (position 7.5, -72.5)
- Complex belt system connecting all components with multiple belt groups

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to pick up non-existent entities
- Verify entity existence at target position before attempting pickup operations
- Double check coordinates when trying to pick up transport belts or other entities

### Errors when placing inserters in occupied spaces
- Check if target position is already occupied before placing new inserters
- When placing entities next to existing structures:
  - Consider increasing spacing parameter
  - Try different directions
  - Verify reference positions are correct
  - Ensure target position is clear of other entities
